Welcome: This is a desktop application that fetches your blood sugar from LibreLinkUp
getCredentialsStep1: As sharing person, open your <1>Libre smartphone app</1>, go to <3>Connected Apps</3>, click on <5>Manage</5> next to LibreLinkUp, click on <7>Add connection</7> and input the details for the account you wish to use with LibreLinkUpDesktop.
getCredentialsStep2: Save those credentials inside your password manager. You may use them for yourself or you may share them with someone.
getCredentialsStep3: Enter those credentials on this login page.
